title: How does Draven not cut himself?

replies.body: He's Draaaven. He's too badass to care about little things like physics.
Who needs arms and physics when you have swag.

In game he holds them out away from his body and holds them with the ring facing outwards.

In that picture, he loses an arm.

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ilolz2p6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-08T14:40:58.935+0000)
>
> In game he holds them out away from his body and holds them with the ring facing outwards.
> 
> In that picture, he loses an arm.

Then if he throws it, it wouldn't have that much throwing power or be that accurate. Because the way he's holding them,  it's like throwing a spear.
That's the point of the weapon. Draven is intentionally using something no sensible person would ever use because he wants to show off.
his skin is too thick to be cut.
